subject: United States Open (Golf)
Golf
lead_paragraph: Luke Donald and Lee Westwood, both former No. 1's in the world golf rankings, are still seeking a major title, and their optimum setup could be the tight U.S. Open layout.
snippet: Luke Donald and Lee Westwood, both former No. 1's in the world golf rankings, are still seeking a major title, and their optimum setup could be the tight U.S. Open layout.
